alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 6:26PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Wasco County through 700 PM PDT... At 626 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Timothy Lake, or 9 miles south of Government Camp, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Wasco County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
